title: Miso Soup
summary: The recipe Miso Soup is ready in approximately 28 minutes and is definitely a super gluten free and vegan option for lovers of Japanese food. This soup has 104 calories, 9g of protein, and 2g of fat per serving. For $1.28 per serving, this recipe covers 14% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 2. A mixture of water, tofu, mushrooms, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. 35 people have made this recipe and would make it again. It is perfect for Autumn. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 98%. This score is spectacular. Similar recipes include A Quick And Easy Soup {miso Soup With Soba Noodles Or Mung Bean, Carrot-ginger-miso Soup And Minted Pea Soup, and Miso Soup.

winePairing.pairingText: Gewurztraminer, Chenin Blanc, and Riesling are great choices for Asian. The best wine for Asian food depends on the cuisine and dish - of course - but these acidic whites pair with a number of traditional meals, spicy or not. You could try Villa Wolf Pfalz Gewurztraminer. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.1 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 13 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Villa Wolf Pfalz Gewurztraminer
